long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple Chrome extension lets you easily save or print your ChatGPT conversations. It's a straightforward tool with no bells and whistlesâ€”just the essentials for anyone looking to keep a record of their chats. Conversations are saved as HTML files for future reference or printed out for offline reading.

Simple to Use: One click to save or print. No setup required.
Privacy-Focused: no data leaves your client.
For Everyone: Whether you're saving chats for research or printing for reading, this tool is made for you.
Up-to-Date: Compatible with the latest version of ChatGPT.

What's New in Version 1.3:

Bug Fix: remove response rating, etc. buttons and "Thought for..." messages from print version
Bug Fix: Improve reliability of print popup to address some rare edge cases.

What's New in Version 1.2:

Image Support: Now includes both user-uploaded images and AI-generated images in printed conversations.
Improved Layout: Minor adjustments to the look and feel of the saved and printed HTML files

Bug Fix: Resolved an issue where user content was not included in the saved or printed HTML due to recent changes in ChatGPT.

What's New in Version 1.1:

Bug Fix: Adapted URL detection to work with ChatGPT's updated website structure.
